parameters.query: =SELECT id, tenant_id, client_final_id, numero_facture, date_facture, montant_ht, montant_ttc, tva_taux, description, mode_paiement, statut FROM invoices WHERE id = '{{ $json.invoiceId }}' AND tenant_id = '{{ $json.tenantId }}' AND statut NOT IN ('brouillon', 'annulee')

=SELECT COALESCE(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(numero_avoir FROM 'AVO-[0-9]{4}-([0-9]+)') AS INTEGER)), 0) + 1 as next_num FROM avoirs WHERE tenant_id = '{{ $json.tenant_id }}' AND numero_avoir LIKE 'AVO-' || EXTRACT(YEAR FROM NOW())::text || '-%'

=INSERT INTO avoirs (id, tenant_id, client_final_id, invoice_id, numero_avoir, date_avoir, montant_ht, montant_ttc, tva_taux, motif, description, statut, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (gen_random_uuid(), '{{ $json.tenant_id }}', {{ $json.client_final_id ? "'" + $json.client_final_id + "'" : 'NULL' }}, '{{ $json.id }}', '{{ $json.numeroAvoir }}', NOW(), {{ $json.montant_ht }}, {{ $json.montant_ttc }}, {{ $json.tva_taux || 20 }}, 'Avoir sur facture {{ $json.numero_facture }}', {{ $json.description ? "'" + $json.description.replace(/'/g, "''") + "'" : 'NULL' }}, 'brouillon', NOW(), NOW()) RETURNING id, tenant_id, client_final_id, invoice_id, numero_avoir, date_avoir, montant_ht, montant_ttc, tva_taux, motif, statut, created_at
=SELECT id, invoice_id, code_article, designation, quantite, prix_unitaire_ht, total_ht, ordre FROM invoice_lines WHERE invoice_id = '{{ $('02. Parser').first().json.invoiceId }}' ORDER BY ordre ASC

={{ $json.hasLines && $json.lineInserts.length > 0 ? $json.lineInserts.map(item => "INSERT INTO avoir_lines (id, avoir_id, code_article, designation, quantite, prix_unitaire_ht, total_ht, ordre) VALUES (gen_random_uuid(), '" + item.avoirId + "', " + (item.codeArticle ? "'" + item.codeArticle + "'" : "null") + ", '" + (item.designation || '').replace(/'/g, "''") + "', " + (item.quantite || 0) + ", " + (item.prixUnitaireHt || 0) + ", " + (item.totalHt || 0) + ", " + (item.ordre || 0) + ")").join("; ") + "; SELECT 1" : "SELECT 1" }}
